name: constellation
description: platform for creating an automatic scheduling system for students that is easily customizable for individual schools and districts
author: Trevor Snodgrass

scripts.start: npm run npm:prune && npm run npm:install && npm run server:start
scripts.dev: npm run npm:prune && npm run npm:install && npm run server
scripts.test: npm run npm:prune && npm run npm:install && npm run routes:test
scripts.build: npm run npm:prune && npm run npm:install && npm run server
